messages.subject: Recommended Reading???
messages.msgSnippet: I was wondering if you would be willing to share the titles of books that have been beneficial to you during your homeschooling/unschooling journey.  I m more
messages.messageBody:
I was wondering if you would be willing to share the titles of books
that have been beneficial to you during your
homeschooling/unschooling journey. I'm more interested in function
than history.

I'm particularly interested in books, if there are any, that reflect
a home situation that's not the typical "mom and dad are both
wonderful and involved in the unschooling of their children." Are
there any books that reflect a family that maybe has one directly
involved parent with a combination of children in different schooling
scenarios? I'm not only interested in this, but would love to read
something from that slant.

Thanks for your suggestions...

Tina
